name: Solitaire Tripeaks！
description:
Welcome to the world of Solitaire Fishing!

Tired of the classic Solitaire and the traditional Tripeak Solitaire game?
Don't worry!We have created a new Tripeak Solitaire game for you and you can enjoy it right now!

Never played any card games before?
Don't worry!Solitaire Fishing is easy to play even if you have never played a similar game.

The solitaire fishing is a game of such a novel and interesting tripeaks solitaire!
In the game, you can not only enjoy the fun of the card game, but also enjoy the underwater world!

Eliminate the gold cards to save the fish in the game and become a hero of the underwater world right now!


New gameplay, free games
Fresh and lovely picture, smooth operation experience
Simple game rules, easy operation
Many kinds of obstacles, challenging level
Daily login can receive rich rewards
There are many props to help you complete the level
Anytime, anywhere, easy to play
Become a fish hero by eliminating gold cards to save the fish


You can download and play free now! What are you waiting for!
